trans-unit.source: Instances of this class are passed to the <xref:System.Net.DownloadDataCompletedEventHandler>.
trans-unit.target: Instanties van deze klasse worden doorgegeven aan de <xref:System.Net.DownloadDataCompletedEventHandler>.</xref:System.Net.DownloadDataCompletedEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Gets the data that is downloaded by a <xref:System.Net.WebClient.DownloadDataAsync*> method.
trans-unit.target: Opgehaald van de gegevens die is gedownload door een <xref:System.Net.WebClient.DownloadDataAsync*>methode.</xref:System.Net.WebClient.DownloadDataAsync*>

trans-unit.source: You should check the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> properties before using the data that is returned by this property.
trans-unit.target: Controleer de <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>en <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A>Eigenschappen voordat u de gegevens die wordt geretourneerd door deze eigenschap.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> property's value is an <xref:System.Exception> object or the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> property's value is `true`, the asynchronous operation did not complete correctly and the Result property's value will not be valid.
trans-unit.target: Als de <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>waarde van de eigenschap is een <xref:System.Exception>object of de <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A>is de waarde van eigenschap `true`, de asynchrone bewerking is niet goed voltooid en de eigenschap Result-waarde niet meer geldig.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> </xref:System.Exception> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Byte> array that contains the downloaded data.
